antiPatterns.name: Service Chain
antiPatterns.description: This antipattern describes a chain of service calls which is needed to fulfill goals of the services.
antiPatterns.context: Multiple services that call each other to fulfill their goals.
sources: @inproceedings{nayrolles2013improving, title={Improving SOA antipatterns detection in Service Based Systems by mining execution traces}, author={Nayrolles, Mathieu and Moha, Naouel and Valtchev, Petko}, booktitle={Reverse Engineering (WCRE), 2013 20th Working Conference on}, pages={321--330}, year={2013}, doi={10.1109/WCRE.2013.6671307}}
